name: Seeds of Hope
description:
An Alien race releases fire monsters to obliterate Planet Rootanis. They use fire to adapt the planet to their needs which are fire and extremely hot temperatures. There is only one Hope, The young Rootaldinho, from the decimated Rootanians, has the power to spit a unique type of seed that can convert fire into life. Join him on this adventure to save life.

This is a roguelike game, you spit the seeds with the "X" button to prison the aliens with roots of life, and if you touch the enemies they will burn you.  Eliminate all the fire monsters and then when the gatekeeper awakens do the same, to go to the next zone.

Claymation was the technique used because is practical in situations like a Jam to speed up the process.

The first version of this game, was made with Construct 3 free version, limited to 40 actions, in a 3-day GameJam.
